item.title: 渣打银行第三季度利润因中国房地产和银行业减值而大幅下滑
item.description:
Standard Chartered (StanChart) (STAN.L) on Thursday said third-quarter pre-tax profit fell by a third, much worse than analysts had expected, as it took a nearly $1 billion hit from its exposure to China's real estate and banking sectors.

渣打银行 (StanChart) (STAN.L)周四表示，第三季度税前利润下降了三分之一，远低于分析师的预期，因中国房地产和银行业的风险敞口使其遭受了近 10 亿美元的打击。

StanChart, which earns most of its revenue in Asia, said statutory pretax profit for the third quarter of this year fell to $633 million.

大部分收入来自亚洲的渣打银行表示，今年第三季度的法定税前利润降至 6.33 亿美元。

That compared with $996 million a year earlier and the $1.41 billion average of 16 analyst estimates compiled by the bank.

相比之下，去年同期为 9.96 亿美元，该银行编制的 16 名分析师平均预测为 14.1 亿美元。

The bank's Hong Kong shares were down 5% on the weaker earnings after resuming trade in the afternoon session.

下午恢复交易后，该银行的香港股价因盈利疲软而下跌 5%。

Credit impairment charges rose by $62 million from the same period a year prior to $294 million, as the bank took a $186 million charge related to China's troubled commercial real estate market.

信用减值费用较上年同期增加了 6,200 万美元，从 2.94 亿美元增至 2.94 亿美元，原因是该银行针对中国陷入困境的商业房地产市场收取了 1.86 亿美元的费用。

The bank also took a $700 million hit from its stake in China Bohai Bank (9668.HK), which it said reflected subdued earnings at the lender and the challenging economic backdrop.

该银行还因持有的渤海银行（9668.HK）股份而遭受了7亿美元的损失，该银行表示，这反映了该行盈利疲弱和充满挑战的经济背景。

The hefty losses in China, where StanChart has based much of its expansion effort, underlines the challenge the lender faces to improve returns via exposure to the world's second-largest economy at a time when growth is slowing and loan loss is on the rise.

渣打银行大部分扩张工作都集中在中国，而中国的巨额亏损突显了该行在经济增长放缓、贷款损失上升之际，通过在全球第二大经济体的投资来提高回报所面临的挑战。

Its total China real estate exposure stood at $2.7 billion, down $200 million from the previous quarter.

其中国房地产风险总额为 27 亿美元，比上一季度减少 2 亿美元。

The Chinese economy, despite a raft of government easing measures, remains fragile as crisis in its property market deepens with high-profile debt-repayment defaults and the absence of state support.

尽管政府采取了一系列宽松措施，但随着房地产市场危机因高调的债务偿还违约和缺乏国家支持而加深，中国经济仍然脆弱。

Domestic banking peers have reported margin squeeze amid downward pressure while foreign banks, with smaller exposure, now have started to take an increased blow as sentiment worsens and the government guides lenders to lower mortgage rates.

国内银行业同行报告称，在下行压力下利润率受到挤压，而风险敞口较小的外资银行现在开始受到更大的打击，因为市场情绪恶化，政府引导贷款机构降低抵押贷款利率。

StanChart said the hit on its investment in China Bohai, a lender in the eastern coastal city Tianjin, was due to lower forecasted interest rates and decreased lending margins reported in the bank's half-year results.

渣打银行表示，其对中国渤海银行（东部沿海城市天津的一家银行）的投资受到打击，是由于该银行半年业绩中报告的预测利率较低以及贷款利润率下降。

Bohai bank reported net interest income in the first half of 2023 slumped 17.8%, leading to a nearly 7% decline in its overall profit.

渤海银行2023年上半年净利息收入下降17.8%，整体利润下降近7%。

StanChart said it remains confident of hitting its returns on tangible equity targets of 10% this year and 11% in 2024, but downgraded some of its other performance forecasts for the year.

渣打银行表示，仍有信心实现今年 10% 和 2024 年 11% 的有形股本回报率目标，但下调了今年的一些其他业绩预测。

Net interest margin, a measure of return on lending, will now "approach" 1.7 percentage points rather than be "around" that level, it said.

它表示，衡量贷款回报率的净息差现在将“接近”1.7个百分点，而不是“接近”该水平。

Income in the bank's Financial Markets trading division fell 8% in the third quarter compared to the same period a year earlier, as falling market volatility reduced clients' appetite for trading in products related to interest rates, commodities and foreign exchange in particular.

该银行金融市场交易部门第三季度收入同比下降8%，原因是市场波动性下降降低了客户对利率、大宗商品和外汇相关产品交易的兴趣。

Reporting by Selena Li and Lawrence White; Editing by Christopher Cushing

item.title: 汽车制造商沃尔沃汽车第三季度营业利润增长
item.description:
Sweden-based automaker Volvo Cars (VOLCARb.ST) reported a rise in third-quarter operating earnings on Thursday driven by strong volumes and lower costs for semiconductors and raw materials.

总部位于瑞典的汽车制造商沃尔沃汽车(VOLCARb.ST)周四报告称，由于销量强劲以及半导体和原材料成本下降，第三季度营业利润有所增长。

Volvo Cars, majority-owned by China's Geely Holding, said operating income rose to 4.5 billion Swedish crowns ($402.75 million) in the quarter from a year-ago 2.1 billion.

由中国吉利控股控股的沃尔沃汽车表示，本季度营业收入从去年同期的 21 亿瑞典克朗（4.0275 亿美元）增至 45 亿瑞典克朗（合 4.0275 亿美元）。

"We remain vigilant in light of the macroeconomic and geopolitical uncertainties and remain laser-focused on execution," Chief Executive Jim Rowan said in a statement.

首席执行官吉姆·罗文在一份声明中表示：“鉴于宏观经济和地缘政治的不确定性，我们保持警惕，并继续专注于执行。”

($1 = 11.1732 Swedish crowns)

（1 美元 = 11.1732 瑞典克朗）

Reporting by Marie Mannes, editing by Essi Lehto

item.title: 由于干预紧张，美元走强，日元跌至一年低点
item.description:
The dollar was buoyant on Thursday, hovering near a two-week high as Treasury yields rose and investor appetite for riskier currencies dimmed, while the yen breached 150 per dollar to keep traders jittery about the prospect of intervention.

周四美元走强，徘徊在两周高点附近，因美国国债收益率上升，投资者对风险较高货币的兴趣减弱，而日元兑美元突破150，令交易员对干预前景感到紧张。

The Japanese yen weakened to hit a fresh one-year low of 150.48 per dollar and was not far off the 32-year low of 151.94 per dollar it touched in October last year that led to Japanese authorities intervening in the currency market.

日元走弱，触及一年新低150.48美元，距离去年10月触及的32年低点151.94美元不远，当时日本当局干预了货币市场。

Japanese Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki warned traders against selling the yen again on Thursday, saying authorities were closely watching moves. "I'm watching market moves with a sense of urgency, as before," he told reporters at his ministry.

日本财务大臣铃木俊一周四警告交易员不要再次抛售日元，称当局正在密切关注走势。 “我像以前一样以紧迫感关注市场走势，”他在部长会议上对记者表示。

Suzuki made no direct comment about the potential for intervention.

铃木没有直接评论干预的可能性。

"Given the cap on Japanese yields, something had to give in the context of enduring dollar strength on the back of U.S. macroeconomic resilience," said Nicholas Chia, macro strategist at Standard Chartered.

渣打银行(Standard Chartered)宏观策略师尼古拉斯·谢(Nicholas Chia)表示，“考虑到日本收益率的上限，在美国宏观经济弹性支撑下美元持续走强的背景下，必须做出一些让步。”

A recent surge in global interest rates is heightening pressure on the Bank of Japan to change its bond yield control next week. A hike to an existing yield cap set three months ago being discussed as a possibility, sources have told Reuters.

近期全球利率飙升加大了日本央行下周改变债券收益率控制的压力。 消息人士告诉路透社，提高三个月前设定的现有收益率上限的可能性正在讨论中。

Japan's low yields have made the currency an easy target for short-sellers and funding trades, with the widening gap in the interest rates between Japan and the United States leading to persistent weakness in the yen.

日本的低收益率使得日元很容易成为卖空者和融资交易的目标，而日本和美国之间不断扩大的利差导致日元持续疲软。

The yen has fallen over 20% since the U.S. Federal Reserve began rapidly raising rates to combat inflation in March 2022, while the BOJ remains an outlier among central banks and has stuck to its ultra lose monetary policy.

自美联储于 2022 年 3 月开始快速加息以应对通胀以来，日元已下跌超过 20%，而日本央行仍然是央行中的异类，并坚持其超亏损货币政策。

"Any judgment on the yen also needs to account for the central bank's reaction function," said Chia. "In other words, there is the risk of an earlier-than-envisaged policy shift by the BOJ, given its track record of surprising markets."

“对日元的任何判断也需要考虑央行的反应功能，”Chia表示。 “换句话来说，考虑到日本央行令人惊讶的市场记录，存在着早于预期的政策转变的风险。”

U.S. GDP data due later on Thursday is a key event risk for dollar/yen, according to Carol Kong, currency strategist at Commonwealth Bank of Australia, who said a strong report may pressure U.S. yields higher and result in the yen testing fresh lows.

澳大利亚联邦银行货币策略师Carol Kong表示，周四晚些时候公布的美国GDP数据是美元/日元面临的一个关键事件风险，她表示强劲的报告可能会令美国收益率走高，并导致日元测试新低。

Benchmark U.S. 10-year Treasury yields inched higher, resuming a move toward a 16-year peak of 5.0% briefly breached on Monday. The 10-year yield was at 4.959% on Thursday.

基准美国 10 年期国债收益率小幅走高，恢复向周一短暂突破的 5.0% 的 16 年高点迈进。周四10年期国债收益率为4.959%。

The Australian dollar slid to a one-year low of $0.6271 and was last down 0.49% at $0.6278. A surprisingly high reading for inflation on Wednesday stoked expectations of a further hike in interest rates.

澳元兑美元跌至一年低点0.6271美元，最后下跌0.49%至0.6278美元。周三通胀数据出人意​​料地高，引发了进一步加息的预期。

The head of Australia's central bank on Thursday said the strong third-quarter inflation report was around policymakers' expectations, and they were still considering whether it would warrant a rate rise.

澳大利亚央行行长周四表示，强劲的第三季度通胀报告符合政策制定者的预期，他们仍在考虑是否需要加息。

The New Zealand dollar touched a near one-year low of $0.5774 and was last down 0.38% at $0.5779.

新西兰元兑美元触及近一年低点0.5774美元，最后下跌0.38%至0.5779美元。

SPOTLIGHT ON ECB

Investor focus will be on the policy decision from the European Central Bank later in the day, with the euro touching one week low of $1.0542 earlier in the session. The single currency was last down 0.17% at $1.0545.

投资者关注的焦点将是当天晚些时候欧洲央行的政策决定，欧元兑美元盘中早些时候触及一周低点1.0542美元。单一货币最后下跌 0.17% 至 1.0545 美元。

The ECB is expected to keep interest rates unchanged at a record high, snapping a 15-month streak of hikes. It may discuss a quicker reduction of its oversized portfolio of government debt as it battles excessive inflation.

预计欧洲央行将把利率维持在历史高位不变，结束15个月的连续加息。在应对过度通胀的过程中，它可能会讨论更快地削减其庞大的政府债务组合。

"With the European economy soft and inflation easing, we expect attention will soon turn to the likely timing of rate cuts," said CBA's Kong.

“随着欧洲经济疲软和通胀缓和，我们预计注意力将很快转向可能的降息时机，”联邦银行的孔表示。

"At this stage we have the first cut pencilled in for June 2024. Soft European economic data and negative interest rate differentials between Europe and the U.S. will likely keep a lid on euro/dollar."

“现阶段，我们预计将于 2024 年 6 月进行首次降息。疲软的欧洲经济数据以及欧洲和美国之间的负利差可能会抑制欧元/美元的走势。”

Sterling was last at $1.2081, down 0.23% on the day, having touched a three week low of $1.2077 earlier in the session.

英镑最新报1.2081美元，当日下跌0.23%，盘中早些时候曾触及三周低点1.2077美元。

Against a basket of currencies, the dollar was 0.188% higher at 106.75 after touching a two week peak of 106.78.

美元兑一篮子货币上涨0.188%，至106.75，此前触及两周高点106.78。

The Canadian dollar fell 0.15% versus the greenback to 1.38 per dollar after the Bank of Canada held its key overnight rate at 5.0% as expected but left the door open to more rate hikes to tame inflation.

加拿大央行如预期将关键隔夜利率维持在 5.0%，但为进一步加息以抑制通胀敞开了大门，加元兑美元汇率下跌 0.15%，至 1.38 美元兑 1 美元。

The Fed and the BOJ meet next week.

美联储和日本央行下周举行会议。

In cryptocurrencies, bitcoin last rose 0.1% to $34,714.14. The world's largest cryptocurrency has surged 15% this week on the back of speculation that an exchange-traded bitcoin fund is imminent.

加密货币方面，比特币上涨 0.1%，至 34,714.14 美元。由于市场猜测交易所交易的比特币基金即将成立，全球最大的加密货币本周飙升了 15%。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Singapore; Editing by Edwina Gibbs and Lincoln Feast.

item.title: 中国最年轻航天员启程前往空间站
item.description:
The youngest-ever crew of Chinese astronauts departed for China's space station on Thursday, paving the way for a new generation of "taikonauts" to advance the country's space ambitions in the future.

周四，有史以来最年轻的中国航天员启程前往中国空间站，为新一代“航天员”推进中国未来的太空雄心铺平了道路。

The spacecraft Shenzhou-17, or "Divine Vessel", and its three passengers lifted off atop a Long March-2F rocket from the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Centre in northwest China.

神舟十七号飞船及其三名乘客乘坐长征二号F火箭从中国西北部的酒泉卫星发射中心升空。

Leading the six-month mission was former air force pilot Tang Hongbo, 48, who was on the first crewed mission to the space station in 2021.

领导这项为期六个月的任务的是 48 岁的前空军飞行员唐洪波，他于 2021 年执行了首次载人空间站任务。

His return to the orbiting outpost Tiangong, or "Celestial Palace" in Chinese, also set a new record for the shortest interval between two spaceflight missions by taikonauts - coined from the Chinese word for space - suggesting a faster rotation of taikonauts in coming years.

他返回轨道前哨站天宫，也创下了航天员两次航天任务之间最短间隔的新纪录，这意味着未来几年航天员的轮换速度会更快。

Tang, from China's second batch of astronauts in 2010, had to wait more than a decade before he was picked for his inaugural spaceflight in 2021.

唐是2010年中国第二批航天员，等了十多年才被选中参加2021年的首次航天飞行。

By contrast, his fellow Shenzhou-17 crew members Tang Shengjie, 33, and Jiang Xinlin, 35, both travelling to space for the first time, joined China's third batch of astronauts in September 2020.

相比之下，神舟十七号机组成员唐胜杰（33岁）和蒋新林（35岁）都是首次进入太空，于2020年9月加入中国第三批航天员。

China has already kickstarted the selection process for the fourth batch of astronauts, seeking candidates with doctoral degrees in disciplines from biology, physics and chemistry to biomedical engineering and astronomy.

中国已经启动了第四批航天员的选拔工作，寻找具有生物学、物理化学、生物医学工程和天文学等学科博士学位的候选人。

It is also opening the process to applicants from Hong Kong and Macau for the first time.

它还首次向香港和澳门的申请人开放该流程。

The first and second batches of astronauts were all former air force pilots, like Tang, who joined the People's Liberation Army in 1995 at age 20.

第一批和第二批宇航员都是前空军飞行员，比如唐，1995年20岁时加入解放军。

FOREIGN ASTRONAUTS

The selection and training process will commence soon for foreign astronauts looking to participate in joint flights to Tiangong, a senior official on China's manned space program said this year.

中国载人航天计划的一位高级官员今年表示，对于希望参加天宫联合飞行的外国宇航员的选拔和培训过程即将开始。

But as much as China is showcasing its efforts to internationalise its space missions, its space program has distinct Chinese characteristics, at least on Tiangong.

但尽管中国正在展示其太空任务国际化的努力，但其太空计划具有鲜明的中国特色，至少在天宫上是这样。

In a departure from the NASA-led International Space Station (ISS), where English is the working language, only Chinese is used on Tiangong, making Chinese-language skills a key criteria for foreign participants.

与美国宇航局领导的国际空间站（ISS）以英语为工作语言不同，天宫号上只使用中文，这使得中文能力成为外国参与者的关键标准。

Tiangong has become a symbol of China's growing confidence in its space endeavours after being shut out of the ISS program for decades. China is banned by U.S. law from any collaboration, direct or indirect, with NASA.

在被排除在国际空间站计划之外数十年后，天宫号已成为中国对其太空事业信心不断增强的象征。美国法律禁止中国与美国宇航局进行任何直接或间接的合作。

Tiangong, completed in late 2022, can house a maximum of three astronauts at an orbital altitude of up to 450 km (280 miles) and will have an operational lifespan of more than 15 years.

天宫号于 2022 年底竣工，最多可容纳三名宇航员，轨道高度高达 450 公里（280 英里）， 使用寿命将超过 15 年。

The Shenzhou-17 astronauts will replace the Shenzhou-16 crew, who arrived at Tiangong at the end of May.

神舟十七号航天员将接替五月底抵达天宫的神舟十六号宇航员。

The Shenzhou-16 crew, consisting of veteran astronaut Jing Haipeng, Zhu Yangzhu and Gui Haichao, is scheduled to return to earth on Oct. 31.

由老航天员景海鹏、朱扬柱、桂海超组成的神舟十六号机组人员计划于10月31日返回地球。

Zhu and Gui, both in their 30s, are from China's third batch of astronauts.

朱和桂都是30多岁的人，都是中国第三批航天员。

Shenzhou-17 marks China's 12th crewed mission since Yang Liwei's solo spaceflight in October 2003, the first Chinese national in space.

神舟十七号是继2003年10月杨利伟单人航天飞行之后中国第12次载人飞行任务，杨利伟是中国第一个进入太空的人。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; Editing by Tom Hogue and Gerry Doyle

item.title: Stellantis以16亿美元入股电动汽车公司零跑汽车重置中国战略
item.description:
Summary:
  • Stellantis to acquire 21% stake in EV maker Leapmotor

    Stellantis将收购电动汽车制造商零跑汽车21%的股份
  • Firms form JV to build and sell Leapmotor products outside China

    公司成立合资公司在中国境外生产和销售零跑汽车产品
  • Deal gives Stellantis a crucial foothold in China

    这笔交易为Stellantis在中国奠定了重要的立足点
  • Leapmotor shares tumble 10%, reversing initial 11% jump

    零跑汽车股价大跌10%，扭转了最初11%的涨幅

Stellantis is buying a 21% stake in Leapmotor for $1.6 billion, it said on Thursday, in a reset of its China strategy to focus on electric vehicles after years of poor sales and manufacturing pullback in the world's biggest auto market.

零跑汽车周四表示，斯特兰蒂斯将以 16 亿美元收购零跑汽车 21% 的股份，此举是为了在全球最大汽车市场多年销售不佳和制造业萎缩后重新调整其中国战略，专注于电动汽车。

The Chinese EV maker also announced the formation of a joint venture with Stellantis (STLAM.MI), in which the Chrysler parent will own a 51% stake giving it exclusive rights for the export, sale and manufacturing of Zhejiang Leapmotor Technology's (9863.HK) products outside Greater China.

这家中国电动汽车制造商还宣布与 Stellantis (STLAM.MI)成立一家合资企业，克莱斯勒母公司将拥有 51% 的股份，从而获得浙江零跑科技(9863.HK)的出口、销售和制造的独家权利。 ）大中华区以外的产品。

The deal, which follows a Volkswagen-Xpeng (VOWG_p.DE), (9868.HK) tie-up announced in July, heralds a new era of automotive alliances in China and reflects how the country is emerging as a global centre of EV technology.

继大众汽车与小鹏汽车(VOWG_p.DE) (9868.HK) 于 7 月宣布合作之后，该交易预示着中国汽车联盟的新时代，并反映了中国如何成为全球电动汽车技术中心。

"We haven’t been so successful in China so we prefer to rely on a Chinese partner. To win in China is better to win with a Chinese company," Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares told a news conference in the eastern Chinese city of Hangzhou.

Stellantis首席执行官卡洛斯·塔瓦雷斯(Carlos Tavares)在中国东部城市杭州举行的新闻发布会上表示：“我们在中国还没有取得如此成功，因此我们更愿意依赖中国合作伙伴。要在中国获胜，最好是与中国公司一起获胜。”

"This is a race on speed. We can help to enhance the speed," he said, seated beside Leapmotor CEO Zhu Jiangming.

“这是一场速度的竞赛。我们可以帮助提高速度，”坐在零跑汽车首席执行官朱江明旁边的他说道。

Stellantis, formed at the start of 2021 through the merger of France's PSA with Fiat Chrysler (FCA), has struggled to sell cars in China and has been looking to reshuffle its strategy in the country where it has a joint venture with Dongfeng Motor Group (0489.HK).

Stellantis 成立于 2021 年初，由法国 PSA 与菲亚特克莱斯勒 (FCA) 合并而成，该公司在中国销售汽车一直举步维艰，并一直在寻求调整其在中国的战略，该公司与东风汽车集团 (Dongfeng Motor Group) 建立了合资企业。 0489.HK） 。

The group, whose brands include Fiat and Peugeot, said a year ago it was closing its joint venture that makes Jeeps in China with Guangzhou Automobile Group (601238.SS) after disappointing results.

该集团旗下品牌包括菲亚特和标致，一年前表示，由于业绩令人失望，该集团将关闭与广汽集团（601238.SS）在中国生产吉普车的合资企业。

Stellantis and rivals such as Renault (RENA.PA) have been concerned about growing competition from cheap Chinese electric cars in Europe, a worry shared by the European Commission which has launched an anti-subsidy probe into whether to set tariffs to shield European producers from Chinese EV imports.

Stellantis 和雷诺(RENA.PA)等竞争对手一直担心欧洲廉价中国电动汽车的竞争日益激烈，欧盟委员会也有同样的担忧，该委员会已启动反补贴调查，以调查是否设定关税以保护欧洲生产商中国电动汽车进口。

Tavares on Thursday criticised the EU probe.

塔瓦雷斯周四批评了欧盟的调查。

"As we have global issues to face, we have to adopt a global mentality. We do not support a fragmented world. We like competition. To start a probe is not the best way to tackle those questions," he said.

“由于我们要面对全球性问题，我们必须采取全球心态。我们不支持分裂的世界。我们喜欢竞争。启动调查并不是解决这些问题的最佳方式，”他说。

Asked about how the Leapmotor partnership was different from its tie-ups with Dongfeng and GAC, Tavares said it was better for a Chinese entity to lead the way in the Chinese market.

当被问及与零跑汽车的合作与与东风和广汽的合作有何不同时，塔瓦雷斯表示，最好由一家中国实体在中国市场引领。

"In the previous partnerships, Stellantis was not the promoter of the development of the Chinese brands overseas. If we develop Leapmotor overseas, it gives Leapmotor better competitiveness in the Chinese market," he said.

“在之前的合作中，Stellantis并不是中国品牌在海外发展的推动者。如果零跑汽车在海外发展，可以让零跑汽车在中国市场拥有更好的竞争力。”他说。

But concerns about intense competition in China and dilution effect sent shares in Leapmotor down 10% on Thursday, reversing an 11% jump upon the market opening.

但对中国激烈竞争和稀释效应的担忧导致零跑汽车股价周四下跌 10%，扭转了开盘时 11% 的涨幅。

More than 40 EV brands are locked in a bruising price war in China, triggered by Tesla's (TSLA.O) price cuts earlier this year. Despite steep price reductions, EV sales are slowing due to weak consumer demand, putting margin pressure on automakers and their suppliers.

特斯拉(TSLA.O)今年早些时候的降价引发了超过 40 个电动汽车品牌在中国陷入激烈的价格战。尽管价格大幅下降，但由于消费者需求疲软，电动汽车销售仍在放缓，给汽车制造商及其供应商带来利润压力。

CULTURE ALIGNMENT

The Netherlands-incorporated joint venture is expected to start its export business in the second half of 2024 and its head will be appointed by Stellantis, Leapmotor said. Stellantis would also have two seats on its board of directors.

零跑汽车表示，这家荷兰合资公司预计将于2024年下半年开始出口业务，负责人将由Stellantis任命。 Stellantis 还将在其董事会中拥有两个席位。

The partnership will help Stellantis expand its EV lineups and meet a 2030 target of EVs accounting for all of its sales in Europe and half of its U.S. sales.

此次合作将帮助 Stellantis 扩大其电动汽车产品线，并实现 2030 年电动汽车销量占其欧洲全部销量和美国销量一半的目标。

Zhu, who founded Leapmotor in 2015, said the company's management had been in contact with many automakers this year and found its culture was aligned with Stellantis.

2015年创立零跑汽车的朱先生表示，公司管理层今年已经与多家汽车制造商接触，发现其文化与Stellantis相符。

Leapmotor said last month it was looking to license its EV platforms, battery and motor technology or EV-ready chassis assemblies to established automakers outside China, adding it needed at least a five-fold increase in sales to survive in a consolidating EV industry.

零跑汽车上个月表示，它正在寻求将其电动汽车平台、电池和电机技术或电动汽车底盘组件授权给中国以外的老牌汽车制造商，并补充说，它的销量需要至少增长五倍才能在整合的电动汽车行业中生存。

Leapmotor ranked ninth by new energy vehicle sales in China in September, according to data from the China Passenger Car Association.

中国乘联会数据显示，9月份零跑汽车在中国新能源汽车销量中排名第九。

The deal, which is subject to regulatory approvals, will see Leapmotor issue 194.3 million Hong Kong-listed shares to Stellantis for HK$43.8 per share, a premium of 19% to its last close of HK$36.80.

该交易尚待监管部门批准，零跑汽车将以每股 43.8 港元的价格向 Stellantis 发行 1.943 亿股香港上市股票，较上一交易日收盘价 36.80 港元溢价 19%。

After the subscription, Stellantis will own about 21.07% of Leapmotor's total issued Hong Kong shares. Shareholder Dahua (002236.SZ), a surveillance giant that was last year hit with export controls by the U.S., said it would sell its 90 million Leapmotor shares to Stellantis as part of the deal.

认购完成后，Stellantis将持有零跑汽车香港已发行股份总数约21.07%。去年受到美国出口管制打击的监控巨头大华股份（002236.SZ）表示，作为交易的一部分，它将向 Stellantis 出售其持有的 9000 万股零跑汽车股份。

item.title: 中美会面为拜登-习近平峰会铺平道路，中东成为焦点
item.description:
Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi begins a long-anticipated visit to Washington on Thursday, as the U.S. and China seek to manage deep strategic differences and pave the way for an expected summit between presidents Joe Biden and Xi Jinping.

中国外交部长王毅周四开始对华盛顿进行期待已久的访问，美国和中国寻求管理深刻的战略分歧，并为预期的乔·拜登总统和习近平总统之间的峰会铺平道路。

The Middle East war has added a fresh dynamic to the testy relationship between the superpowers and Washington is hoping Beijing could use its influence with Iran to help ensure the Israel-Hamas conflict does not spread to the wider region.

中东战争给超级大国之间紧张的关系增添了新的活力，华盛顿希望北京能够利用其对伊朗的影响力来帮助确保以色列与哈马斯的冲突不会蔓延到更广泛的地区。

However, while both Beijing and Washington have spoken of looking for areas where they can work together, and Xi on Wednesday said China was willing to cooperate on global challenges, experts do not expect immediate progress.

然而，尽管北京和华盛顿都谈到寻找可以合作的领域，而且习近平周三表示中国愿意就全球挑战进行合作，但专家预计不会立即取得进展。

The Biden administration's priority with Beijing has been to prevent intense competition between the world's two largest economies and disagreements on a host of issues from trade to Taiwan and the South China Sea veering into conflict.

拜登政府与北京的首要任务是防止世界两大经济体之间的激烈竞争，以及防止在贸易、台湾和南海等一系列问题上的分歧演变成冲突。

U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will welcome Wang at the State Department on Thursday, and he told the U.N. Security Council on Tuesday he would work with him to prevent the Middle East conflict from spreading.

美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯将于周四在国务院欢迎王毅，并于周二向联合国安理会表示，他将与王毅合作，防止中东冲突蔓延。

Policy analysts in China and the U.S. say both sides share an interest in averting a wider war and that China, as a major oil purchaser, has considerable influence it could exert on Iran.

中国和美国的政策分析人士表示，避免更广泛的战争符合双方的共同利益，而且中国作为主要石油购买国，可以对伊朗施加相当大的影响。

But whether Beijing will use it remains to be seen and experts say China may instead watch from the sidelines for a while longer.

但北京是否会使用它还有待观察，专家表示，中国可能会继续观望一段时间。

"The Chinese certainly have an interest in preventing a direct U.S.-Iranian confrontation, as they are major oil consumers and that would spike prices," said Jon Alterman, head of the Middle East program at Washington's Center for Strategic and International Studies.

华盛顿战略与国际研究中心中东项目负责人乔恩·奥尔特曼表示：“中国当然有兴趣阻止美伊直接对抗，因为他们是主要石油消费国，这会导致油价上涨。”

"Still, the Chinese are unlikely to do any heavy lifting here. I expect they'll want a seat at the table when the Israel-Gaza struggle gets resolved, but they don't feel much need or ability to hasten resolution."

“不过，中国人不太可能在这里做任何繁重的工作。我预计，当以色列和加沙的斗争得到解决时，他们会希望在谈判桌上占有一席之地，但他们觉得没有太大的必要或能力来加速解决。”

WANG, BIDEN

Shi Yinhong, professor of international relations at Renmin University of China, said Beijing exerting its influence over Iran was "almost the only serious and practical U.S. expectation of China on the Middle East situation."

中国人民大学国际关系教授时殷弘表示，北京对伊朗施加影响“几乎是美国对中国在中东局势上唯一严肃而实际的期望”。

However Shi added: "The U.S. position on Iran is far from acceptable to China and vice versa. Mutual compromise on this issue could be too limited and small to be of any significance."

但史补充道：“美国在伊朗问题上的立场远不能为中国所接受，反之亦然。在这个问题上的相互妥协可能太有限、太小，没有任何意义。”

Washington has stressed the importance of China's ability to influence Iran. Blinken, during a whirlwind Middle East trip last week, spoke by phone to Wang and asked him to use Beijing's clout to ensure the conflict does not widen.

华盛顿强调了中国影响伊朗的能力的重要性。布林肯上周在中东之行期间与王通电话，要求他利用北京的影响力确保冲突不会扩大。

China has called for restraint and a ceasefire in response to Israel's bombardment of Gaza in retaliation for an Oct. 7 attack by Hamas that Israel says killed 1,400 people. Retaliatory Israeli airstrikes have killed over 6,500 people, the health ministry in Hamas-ruled Gaza said on Wednesday. Reuters has not been able to independently verify the casualty figures of either side.

中国呼吁各方保持克制并停火，以回应以色列对加沙的轰炸，以报复哈马斯 10 月 7 日发动的袭击，以色列称此次袭击造成 1,400 人死亡。哈马斯统治的加沙卫生部周三表示，以色列的报复性空袭已造成 6,500 多人死亡。路透社尚未能够独立核实双方的伤亡数字。

"China has been working tirelessly to promote the cessation of hostilities and the restoration of peace. We have been maintaining close communication with the parties concerned," China's U.N. Ambassador Zhang Jun said on Tuesday.

中国驻联合国大使张军周二表示：“中国一直在为推动停止敌对行动、恢复和平作出不懈努力。我们一直与有关各方保持着密切沟通。”

Wang's visit to Washington comes after several top U.S. officials, including Blinken, visited Beijing in the past several months.

王毅此次访问华盛顿之前，包括布林肯在内的多位美国高级官员在过去几个月访问了北京。

The veteran Chinese diplomat is expected to meet Biden's national security adviser, Jake Sullivan, on Friday. He is also expected to speak with Biden during his visit to the White House, according to two U.S. officials, although it is unclear how substantial their interaction will be.

这位资深的中国外交官预计将于周五会见拜登的国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文。两名美国官员表示，预计他还将在拜登访问白宫期间与他进行交谈，尽管目前尚不清楚他们的互动会有多大。

PATH TO BIDEN-XI MEETING

Analysts expect the discussions to focus on preparations for an anticipated meeting between Biden and Xi on the sidelines of the summit of Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) countries in San Francisco from Nov. 11 to 17. It would be Biden and Xi's first in-person meeting since a summit in Bali last November.

分析人士预计，讨论的重点将是拜登和习近平将于 11 月 11 日至 17 日在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织 (APEC) 国家峰会期间举行的会晤的准备工作。这将是拜登和习近平的首次会面。自去年 11 月巴厘岛峰会以来，人们一直在聚会。

"There are substantive things to be ironed out and finalized," said Yun Sun, director of the China Program at Washington's Stimson Center. "(Wang) will be here for the negotiations only - the big deliverables will be reserved for the top leaders to announce."

华盛顿史汀生中心中国项目主任孙云表示，“有一些实质性的事情需要解决和敲定。” “（王）来这里只是为了谈判——重要的成果将留待最高领导人宣布。”

On Wednesday, Xi said whether Washington and Beijing could establish the "right" way of getting along and managing their differences would be crucial to the world.

周三，习近平表示，华盛顿和北京能否建立“正确”的相处方式并管理分歧，对世界至关重要。

The two sides go into APEC from different economic perspectives, with economic policy analysts saying the U.S. has weathered challenging global conditions after the COVID-19 pandemic somewhat better than China.

双方从不同的经济角度讨论 APEC，经济政策分析师表示，在 COVID-19 大流行之后，美国在应对充满挑战的全球形势方面比中国要好一些。

U.S. and Chinese officials held a virtual meeting on Monday on macroeconomic developments, talks the U.S. called "productive and substantive" and China called "in-depth, frank and constructive."

美国和中国官员周一就宏观经济发展举行了一次虚拟会议，美国称会谈“富有成效和实质性”，中国称会谈“深入、坦诚和建设性”。

U.S. officials said Taiwan and the South and East China Seas, where they accused Beijing of "destabilizing and dangerous actions" against rival territorial claimants, would also be on the agenda.

美国官员表示，台湾和南海和东海问题也将被列入议程，他们指责北京针对敌对领土主张者采取“破坏稳定和危险的行动”。

They said re-establishing military-to-military ties with China remained a top U.S. priority to avoid unintended conflict.

他们表示，与中国重建军事关系仍然是美国的首要任务，以避免意外冲突。

China's Global Times tabloid highlighted contradictions in relations.

中国的《环球时报》小报强调了两国关系中的矛盾。

"Although Sino-U.S. interactions have seen a rapid recovery in different fields," the U.S. policy of attempting to "contain" China had not changed, it said, accusing Washington of "two-faced tactics" in which it "frequently takes various opportunities to discredit China and create friction."

文章称，“虽然中美在不同领域的互动迅速恢复”，但美国试图“遏制”中国的政策没有改变，并指责华盛顿“频繁利用各种机会”，采取“双面策略”。抹黑中国、制造摩擦。”

Reporting by Humeyra Pamuk and David Brunnstrom in Washington and Laurie Chen in Beijing; Additional reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt Editing by Josie Kao

item.title: 亏损加剧野村重新评估中国大陆业务计划
item.description:
Nomura Holdings (8604.T) said on Thursday it is reassessing its mainland China business, as losses mount at its Shanghai-based securities joint venture in another blow to the top Japanese investment bank's global expansion strategy.

野村控股(8604.T)周四表示，正在重新评估其中国大陆业务，因为其位于上海的合资证券公司亏损加剧，这对这家日本顶级投行的全球扩张战略造成了又一次打击。

Nomura's majority-owned joint venture has struggled to grow since its launch in 2019, dragged down by the pandemic and a slowing economy.

野村控股的合资企业自 2019 年成立以来，受疫情和经济放缓的拖累，增长举步维艰。

In 2022, the joint venture lost 225 million yuan ($30.75 million), after losing 84 million yuan in 2021, according to Nomura's filings.

野村证券的文件显示，继 2021 年亏损 8400 万元人民币之后，2022 年该合资企业亏损 2.25 亿元人民币（3075 万美元）。

"With a presence in China for over four decades since 1982, we have consistently sought to contribute to the development of the country's capital markets and service the evolving needs of clients," Nomura said in a statement.

野村证券在一份声明中表示：“自 1982 年以来，我们在中国开展业务已超过四十年，我们始终致力于为中国资本市场的发展做出贡献，并满足客户不断变化的需求。”

"That strategy remains unchanged. Having now fully emerged from the pandemic, we are working constructively with our joint venture partners to determine the most viable path for our onshore business to achieve this long-term objective," it said.

该公司表示：“这一战略保持不变。现在已经完全摆脱了疫情的影响，我们正在与合资伙伴进行建设性合作，以确定我们的陆上业务实现这一长期目标的最可行途径。”

Nomura's China joint venture headcount has dropped to 259 from 281 in July, far short of the original target of increasing it to 500 by this year.

野村证券在中国的合资企业员工人数已从7月份的281人减少至259人，远未达到今年将其增加到500人的原定目标。

While Nomura declined to comment on the reason for the drop, Bloomberg, which first reported the news, said the joint venture has cut jobs and seen a number of departures following a management reshuffle earlier this year.

虽然野村证券拒绝就业绩下降的原因发表评论，但最先报道这一消息的彭博社表示，在今年早些时候进行管理层改组后，该合资企业已经裁员，并出现了一些人离职。

The review comes as the Japanese investment bank is cutting its investment bankers in Hong Kong. Reuters reported that Nomura has laid off about 10 of its Hong Kong-based bankers, including some who were focused on China-related deals.

此次审查是在这家日本投资银行正在裁减其在香港的投资银行家之际进行的。路透社报道称，野村证券已解雇了约 10 名驻香港银行家，其中包括一些专注于中国相关交易的银行家。

Leading U.S. and European banks, such as Goldman Sachs and Citigroup, have launched rounds of layoffs this year in their Asia investment banking units.

高盛(Goldman Sachs)和花旗集团(Citigroup)等美国和欧洲领先银行今年已对其亚洲投行部门进行了多轮裁员。

Nomura received final regulatory approval to launch the joint venture, Nomura Orient International Securities, in 2019, as part of Beijing's move to open its financial sector up to foreign firms.

野村证券于 2019 年获得监管部门的最终批准，成立合资企业野村东方国际证券，这是北京向外国公司开放金融业举措的一部分。

Its original plan called on the joint venture to initially focus on wealth management and eventually expand to wholesale businesses, including investment banking and trading.

其最初的计划是，合资公司最初专注于财富管理，最终扩展到批发业务，包括投资银行和贸易。

The joint venture is 51% owned by Nomura, 24.9% by Orient International Holding, and 24.1% by Shanghai Huangpu Investment Holding Group.

该合资公司由野村证券持股51%，东方国际控股持股24.9%，上海黄浦投资控股集团持股24.1%。

($1 = 7.3172 Chinese yuan renminbi)

（1 美元 = 7.3172 人民币）

item.title: 澳大利亚警方在与中国有组织犯罪有关的洗钱行动中逮捕了七人
item.description:
Australian police have arrested seven members of an alleged Chinese crime syndicate for laundering hundreds of millions of dollars through one of the country's largest money remitters after a giant sting operation involving U.S. Homeland Security.

澳大利亚警方逮捕了一个涉嫌中国犯罪集团的七名成员，罪名是在美国国土安全部参与的大规模诱捕行动后，通过该国最大的汇款机构之一洗钱数亿美元。

Police said on Thursday the Chinese Long River crime syndicate allegedly laundered A$229 million ($143 million) through the Changjiang Currency Exchange, one of the country's largest independently-owned remitters with dozens of shops nationwide, between 2020 and 2023.

警方周四表示，中国长河犯罪集团涉嫌在 2020 年至 2023 年间通过长江货币交易所洗钱 2.29 亿澳元（合 1.43 亿美元）。长江货币交易所是中国最大的独立汇款机构之一，在全国拥有数十家商店。

More than 330 police and other specialists arrested seven alleged members of the syndicate, including four Chinese nationals, on Wednesday during 20 search warrants across five states.

周三，超过 330 名警察和其他专家在五个州发出 20 次搜查令，逮捕了 7 名涉嫌该犯罪团伙的成员，其中包括 4 名中国公民。

“This alleged syndicate was operating in plain sight with shiny shopfronts across the country – it was not operating in the shadows like other money laundering organisations,” Australian Federal Police Eastern Command Assistant Commissioner Stephen Dametto said in a statement on Thursday.

澳大利亚联邦警察东部司令部助理局长史蒂芬·达梅托（Stephen Dametto）周四在一份声明中表示：“这个涉嫌犯罪集团在全国各地都有光鲜亮丽的店面，在众目睽睽之下进行活动，它不像其他洗钱组织那样在暗处运作。”

Investigators suspicions were first raised when the exchange opened new branches during COVID despite the pandemic meaning many of its international tourist and student customers had returned home, according to Dametto.

达梅托表示，调查人员首次提出怀疑是在该交易所在新冠疫情期间开设新分行时，尽管大流行意味着许多国际游客和学生客户已经回国。

A formal investigation, codenamed Operation Avarus-Nightwolf began in August 2022 with the help of six other agencies, including the U.S. Department of Homeland Security Investigations.

在包括美国国土安全调查部在内的其他六个机构的帮助下，一项代号为“阿瓦鲁斯-夜狼行动”的正式调查于 2022 年 8 月开始。

Police allege the syndicate camouflaged the proceeds of cyber scams, illicit goods trafficking and other crime within the exchange's mostly lawful daily transactions, which were as high as A$100 million.

警方称，该犯罪团伙在该交易所大部分合法的日常交易中掩盖了网络诈骗、非法商品贩运和其他犯罪的收益，金额高达 1 亿澳元。

The proceeds allegedly funded an extravagant lifestyle of expensive restaurants, private jets and luxury homes, one valued at more than A$10 million. Police have quarantined more than A$50 million in assets.

据称，所得收益用于资助奢侈的生活方式，包括昂贵的餐厅、私人飞机和豪华住宅，其中一套价值超过 1000 万澳元。警方已查封超过 5000 万澳元的资产。

Police also alleged the syndicate had purchased fake passports, valued at A$200,000 each, in case members needed to flee Australia.

警方还指控该集团购买了每本价值 20 万澳元的假护照，以防成员需要逃离澳大利亚。

The seven arrested, aged between 35 to 40, will appear in a Melbourne court on Thursday.

七名被捕者年龄在 35 岁至 40 岁之间，将于周四在墨尔本法庭出庭。

($1 = 1.5931 Australian dollars)

（1 美元 = 1.5931 澳元）

Reporting by Lewis Jackson; Editing by Michael Perry

item.title: 特斯拉供应商西拉预计在中国出口禁令之前购买更多石墨
item.description:
Australian producer Syrah Resources (SYR.AX) on Thursday said it expects buyers outside of China to step up their purchases of natural graphite before stricter export controls on the battery material came into effect on December 1.

澳大利亚生产商 Syrah Resources (SYR.AX)周四表示，预计中国以外的买家将在 12 月 1 日对电池材料实施更严格的出口管制之前加大对天然石墨的采购。

China, the world's largest graphite producer and exporter, will require export permits as of Dec. 1 for some graphite products, including spherical graphite used by electric vehicle makers.

中国是全球最大的石墨生产国和出口国，自12月1日起，部分石墨产品将需要出口许可证，其中包括电动汽车制造商使用的球形石墨。

Syrah, which has a supply deal with Tesla (TSLA.O), mines graphite at its Balama operations in Mozambique and is building a plant in Louisiana where it will produce active anode material (AAM) for batteries. In May, it paused mining at Balama after oversupply hit prices.

Syrah 与特斯拉(TSLA.O)签订了供应协议，在莫桑比克的巴拉马工厂开采石墨，并正在路易斯安那州建设一家工厂，生产电池活性阳极材料 (AAM)。 5 月份，由于供应过剩影响了价格，该公司暂停了巴拉马 (Balama) 的开采。

The export controls could mean that automakers and suppliers of battery materials will have to accelerate their search for alterative sources of the mineral.

出口管制可能意味着汽车制造商和电池材料供应商将不得不加快寻找替代矿物来源。

Syrah said that, based on feedback from its customers and analysts, buyers are looking to stockpile graphite to reduce the risk of near-term supply disruptions ahead of the ban, and ahead of China's winter when it tends to produce less natural graphite.

Syrah表示，根据客户和分析师的反馈，买家希望在禁令实施之前以及中国冬季天然石墨产量趋于减少的冬季之前储存石墨，以降低近期供应中断的风险。

"Any disruption or reduction in China anode precursor or AAM export supply without replacement supply would impact battery production outside China," it said.

“中国阳极前驱体或 AAM 出口供应的任何中断或减少而没有替代供应，都将影响中国以外的电池生产，”它表示。

Uncertainties regarding the impact of the controls on Chinese supply is expected to continue into 2024, Syrah added, but for now, it does not expect any near-term "meaningful" impact demand from China on its Mozambique project.

Syrah补充说，中国供应管制影响的不确定性预计将持续到2024年，但目前预计中国近期不会对其莫桑比克项目的需求产生任何“有意义”的影响。

"Although the impacts of implementation are not yet known, the announced graphite export controls in China are increasing Government and private sector attention on the strategic importance of Syrah as a unique ex-China natural graphite and AAM supplier in the battery supply chain," the company said in a statement.

“虽然实施的影响尚不清楚，但中国宣布的石墨出口管制正在增加政府和私营部门对 Syrah 作为电池供应链中独特的前中国天然石墨和 AAM 供应商的战略重要性的关注，”公司在一份声明中表示。

Syrah's comments come as Australian government officials visit the United States to shore up cooperation over critical minerals.

西拉发表此番言论之际，澳大利亚政府官员正在访问美国，以加强关键矿产方面的合作。

Shares in Syrah spiked to 43% to A$0.95 a share on Friday when the export bans were announced before trading at $0.66 cents on Thursday.

周五宣布出口禁令后，西拉股价飙升 43%，至每股 0.95 澳元，周四交易价格为 0.66 美分。

The U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC) last month approved a loan of up to $150 million for Syrah's Mozambique operations.

美国国际开发金融公司（DFC）上个月批准为西拉莫桑比克业务提供高达1.5亿美元的贷款。

Reporting by Roushni Nair in Bengaluru and Melanie Burton in Melbourne, editing by Miral Fahmy

Taiwan's defence ministry said that it had detected 15 Chinese air force planes entering Taiwan's air defence zone on Thursday morning, including fighter jets and drones, accompanying Chinese warships carrying out "combat readiness patrols" and drills.

台湾国防部表示，周四上午发现15架中国空军飞机进入台湾防空区，其中包括战斗机和无人机，伴随中国军舰进行“战备巡逻”和演习。

Taiwan, which China claims as its own territory, has repeatedly complained over the past four years of Chinese military activity around the island.

中国声称台湾是自己的领土，过去四年来，台湾多次抱怨中国在台湾周边的军事活动。

item.title: 俄罗斯和中国否决美国推动联合国对以色列和加沙采取行动
item.description:
Russia and China on Wednesday vetoed a U.S. push for the United Nations Security Council to act on the Israel-Hamas conflict by calling for pauses in fighting to allow humanitarian aid access, the protection of civilians and a stop to arming Hamas and other militants in the Gaza Strip.

俄罗斯和中国周三否决了美国推动联合国安理会就以色列与哈马斯冲突采取行动的提案，呼吁暂停战斗以允许人道主义援助进入、保护平民并停止向哈马斯和其他武装分子提供武装。加沙地带。

The United States put forward a draft resolution on Saturday as global outcry grew over a worsening humanitarian crisis and mounting civilian death toll in Gaza. It made the move just days after it vetoed a humanitarian focused draft from Brazil, arguing more time was needed for U.S.-led diplomacy.

随着全球对日益恶化的人道主义危机和加沙平民死亡人数不断上升的强烈抗议，美国于周六提出了一项决议草案。就在几天前，它否决了巴西提出的一项以人道主义为重点的草案，称美国主导的外交需要更多时间。

The initial U.S. text shocked many diplomats with its bluntness in stating Israel has a right to defend itself and demanding Iran stop exporting arms to militant groups. It did not include a call for humanitarian pauses for aid access. But it largely toned down the final text that was put to the vote.

美国最初的文本直言不讳地表示以色列有权自卫并要求伊朗停止向激进组织出口武器，这令许多外交官感到震惊。它不包括呼吁暂停援助准入的人道主义行动。但它在很大程度上淡化了提交表决的最终文本。

"We did listen to all of you," U.S. Ambassador to the U.N. Linda Thomas-Greenfield told the 15-member council after the double veto, which she described as disappointing. "Though today’s vote was a setback, we must not be deterred."

“我们确实听取了你们所有人的意见，”美国驻联合国大使琳达·托马斯-格林菲尔德在双重否决后对由 15 名成员组成的理事会表示，她称这令人失望。 “尽管今天的投票是一次挫折，但我们决不能被吓倒。”

It was a rare move by the United States to suggest Security Council action. Washington has traditionally shielded its ally Israel at the world body.

美国建议安理会采取行动，这是罕见的举动。华盛顿传统上在世界机构中保护其盟友以色列。

Ten members voted for the U.S. text, while the United Arab Emirates voted no and Brazil and Mozambique abstained.

十名成员投票支持美国文本，阿拉伯联合酋长国投了反对票，巴西和莫桑比克投了弃权票。

"The draft does not reflect the world's strongest calls for a ceasefire, an end to the fighting, and it does not help resolve the issue," China's U.N. Ambassador Zhang Jun told the council after the vote. "At this moment, ceasefire is not just a diplomatic term. It means the life and death of many civilians."

中国驻联合国大使张军在表决后对安理会表示：“该草案没有反映世界上停火、结束战斗的最强烈呼声，无助于问题的解决。” “此时此刻，停火不仅仅是一个外交术语。它意味着许多平民的生死。”

U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres has been appealing for a humanitarian ceasefire.

联合国秘书长安东尼奥·古特雷斯一直呼吁人道主义停火。

'OBLIGATION TO ACT'

In the wake of the Security Council deadlock, the 193-member U.N. General Assembly will vote on Friday on a draft resolution put forward by Arab states that calls for a ceasefire. No country holds a veto in the General Assembly. Resolutions are non-binding, but carry political weight.

安理会陷入僵局后，193个成员国的联合国大会将于周五就阿拉伯国家提出的一项呼吁停火的决议草案进行投票。没有国家在联合国大会上拥有否决权。决议不具约束力，但具有政治影响力。

Israel has vowed to wipe out Hamas, which rules Gaza, in retaliation for an Oct. 7 attack that killed 1,400 people. Israel has struck Gaza from the air, imposed a siege on the enclave of 2.3 million people and is preparing a ground invasion. Palestinian authorities say more than 6,500 have been killed.

以色列誓言要消灭统治加沙的哈马斯，以报复 10 月 7 日造成 1,400 人死亡的袭击。以色列从空中袭击了加沙，围困了这个拥有 230 万人口的飞地，并准备发动地面入侵。巴勒斯坦当局称，已有 6,500 多人被杀。

Russia's U.N. Ambassador Vassily Nebenzia accuses the U.S. of putting up a draft resolution that represented Security Council authorization of a ground offensive in Gaza by Israel "while thousands of Palestinian children will continue to die."

俄罗斯驻联合国大使瓦西里·内本齐亚指责美国提出一项代表安理会授权以色列对加沙发动地面进攻的决议草案，“而数千名巴勒斯坦儿童将继续死亡”。

After the double veto, the Security Council then voted on a rival Russian-drafted text that called for a humanitarian ceasefire and withdrawal of Israel's order for civilians in Gaza to relocate south ahead of a ground assault.

在双重否决之后，安理会随后对俄罗斯起草的另一份文本进行了投票，该文本呼吁人道主义停火，并撤回以色列关于加沙平民在地面攻击之前向南迁移的命令。

Russia failed to the get minimum amount of support needed, winning only four votes. A resolution needs at least nine votes and no vetoes by the United States, France, Britain, Russia or China to be adopted.

俄罗斯未能获得所需的最低支持，仅赢得四票。一项决议需要至少九票赞成，并且美国、法国、英国、俄罗斯或中国不得投否决票才能获得通过。

It was Russia's second attempt at a resolution. Only five council members voted in favor of a Russian text on Oct. 16.

这是俄罗斯第二次尝试达成解决方案。 10 月 16 日，只有五名理事会成员投票支持俄文文本。

The elected 10 members of the Security Council now plan to work on a new draft resolution, Malta's U.N. Ambassador Vanessa Frazier said.

马耳他驻联合国大使凡妮莎·弗雷泽表示，选出的 10 个安理会成员现在计划制定一项新的决议草案。

"This crisis is also gripped by a growing risk of a regional spill over. This demands our undivided attention," she said. "We have the duty and the obligation to act."

“这场危机还受到日益增长的区域溢出风险的影响。这需要我们全神贯注，”她说。 “我们有责任和义务采取行动。”

Reporting by Michelle Nichols; editing by Cynthia Osterman and Grant McCool

item.title: 随着美国的打压，中国急于用国内技术替代西方技术
item.description:
Summary:
  • Beijing has increased spending on domestic tech since late 2022

    自 2022 年底以来，北京增加了国内科技支出
  • Telecoms and banks likely next to be pushed to use more Chinese products

    接下来可能会推动电信和银行使用更多中国产品
  • Replacing Western tech due to geopolitics and cyberattack fears

    由于地缘政治和网络攻击的担忧而取代西方技术
  • Foreign firms still dominant in banking-related software

    外国公司在银行相关软件领域仍占主导地位

China has stepped up spending to replace Western-made technology with domestic alternatives as Washington tightens curbs on high-tech exports to its rival, according to government tenders, research documents and four people familiar with the matter.

据政府招标、研究文件和四位知情人士透露，随着华盛顿收紧对其竞争对手高科技出口的限制，中国加大了支出，用国内替代品取代西方制造的技术。

Reuters is reporting for the first time details of tenders from the government, military and state-linked entities, which show an acceleration in domestic substitution since last year.

路透社首次报道了来自政府、军方和国家相关实体的招标细节，这表明自去年以来国内替代正在加速。

China has spent heavily on replacing computer equipment, and the telecom and financial sectors are probably the next target, said two people familiar with the industries. State-backed researchers also identified digital payments as particularly vulnerable to possible Western hacking, according to a review of their work, making a push to indigenize such technology likely.

两位熟悉该行业的人士表示，中国在更换计算机设备上投入了大量资金，电信和金融行业可能是下一个目标。根据对他们工作的审查，国家支持的研究人员还发现，数字支付特别容易受到西方黑客的攻击，因此有可能推动此类技术的本土化。

The number of tenders from state-owned enterprises (SOEs), government and military bodies to nationalize equipment doubled to 235 from 119 in the 12 months after September 2022, according to a finance ministry database seen by Reuters.

路透社看到的财政部数据库显示，2022 年 9 月后的 12 个月内，国有企业、政府和军事机构的设备国有化招标数量从 119 起翻了一番，达到 235 起。

In the same period, the value of awarded projects listed on the database totaled 156.9 million yuan, or more than triple the previous year.

同期，入库的获奖项目价值总计1.569亿元，是上年的三倍多。

While the database represents only a fraction of tender bids nationwide, it is the largest collection of state tenders publicly available and mirrors third-party data. China spent 1.4 trillion yuan ($191 billion) replacing foreign hardware and software in 2022, marking a year-on-year increase of 16.2%, according to IT research firm First New Voice.

虽然该数据库仅代表全国招标的一小部分，但它是公开可用的最大的国家招标集合，并反映了第三方数据。 IT 研究公司 First New Voice 的数据显示，2022 年中国在更换外国硬件和软件方面的支出为 1.4 万亿元人民币（1910 亿美元），同比增长 16.2%。

But Beijing's lack of advanced chip-manufacturing capabilities prevents it from completely substituting products with alternatives that are entirely locally made, analysts say.

但分析人士表示，北京缺乏先进的芯片制造能力，使其无法用完全本地制造的替代品完全替代产品。

Previous domestic substitution efforts stalled because China did not have the "technical chops to pull off localization until now, and to a certain extent they still kind of don't," said Kendra Schaefer, head of tech policy research at Beijing-based consultancy Trivium China.

北京咨询公司 Trivium 技术政策研究主管肯德拉·谢弗 (Kendra Schaefer) 表示，之前的国内替代努力陷入停滞，因为中国“直到现在还不具备实现本地化的技术能力，而且在某种程度上仍然不具备”。中国。

FEAR OF DEPENDENCE

SOEs were instructed last year to replace office software systems with domestic products by 2027, the first time such specific deadlines were imposed, according to five brokerage firms that cited a September 2022 order from China's state asset regulator. Reuters could not independently verify the order.

五家券商援引中国国有资产监管机构 2022 年 9 月的命令称，去年，国有企业被要求在 2027 年之前用国产产品更换办公软件系统，这是首次规定这样的具体期限。路透社无法独立核实该订单。

Domestic replacement projects this year have targeted markedly sensitive infrastructure, the tenders show.

招标显示，今年的国内更换项目主要针对敏感的基础设施。

One partially redacted tender for a "certain government department in Gansu province" assigned 4.4 million yuan to replace an intelligence-gathering system's equipment, without providing specifics.

一份经过部分修改的招标书为“甘肃省某政府部门”拨款 440 万元人民币，用于更换情报收集系统的设备，但没有提供具体细节。

People's Liberation Army units in the northeastern city of Harbin and Xiamen in the south last December meanwhile issued tenders to replace foreign-made computers.

去年12月，位于东北城市哈尔滨和南部城市厦门的中国人民解放军部队同时发布了更换外国制造计算机的招标。

Tech researchers such as Mo Jianlei of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, the country's largest state-run research organization, said the Chinese government was increasingly concerned about Western equipment being hacked by foreign powers.

中国最大的国有研究机构中国科学院的莫建雷等科技研究人员表示，中国政府越来越担心西方设备遭到外国势力的黑客攻击。

The state asset regulator did not return a request for comment.

国有资产监管机构没有回复置评请求。

Over the past year, state-linked researchers also called on Beijing to strengthen anti-hacking defences in its financial infrastructure due to geopolitical concerns.

过去一年，出于地缘政治担忧，与国家相关的研究人员还呼吁北京加强金融基础设施的反黑客防御。

One March research paper highlighted the dependence of China's UnionPay credit card system on U.S software firm BMC for settlements.

3 月份的一篇研究论文强调了中国银联信用卡系统对美国软件公司 BMC 结算的依赖。

"Beware of security vulnerabilities in hardware and software set by the U.S. side ... build a financial security 'firewall'," the researchers wrote.

研究人员写道：“谨防美方设置的硬件和软件安全漏洞……建立金融安全‘防火墙’。”

BMC declined to comment.

BMC 拒绝置评。

An article published this year in the journal Cyberspace Security by researchers from the state-run China Telecommunications Corporation concluded the country was overdependent on chips made by U.S. giant Qualcomm (QCOM.O) for back-end management, as well as on the iOS and Android systems.

国营中国电信集团公司的研究人员今年在《网络空间安全》杂志上发表的一篇文章得出的结论是，中国过度依赖美国巨头高通(QCOM.O)生产的后端管理芯片以及 iOS 和安卓系统。

"(They) are all firmly controlled by American companies," the researchers wrote.

“（它们）都被美国公司牢牢控制，”研究人员写道。

As China has not signed World Trade Organization clauses governing public procurement, the substitution effort does not appear to violate international accords, according to the U.S. Treasury. The U.S. has implemented similar rules barring Chinese companies from public sector bids.

美国财政部称，由于中国尚未签署世界贸易组织有关公共采购的条款，因此替代努力似乎并未违反国际协议。美国也实施了类似的规则，禁止中国公司参与公共部门投标。

Qualcomm, Google (GOOGL.O) and Apple (AAPL.O) did not immediately return requests for comment.

高通、谷歌(GOOGL.O)和苹果(AAPL.O)没有立即回复置评请求。

WINNERS AND LOSERS

China's effort to build an independent computing system dates back to at least its 2006 five-year plan for science and technology development, which listed the semiconductor and software systems sectors as national priorities.

中国建立独立计算系统的努力至少可以追溯到2006年的科技发展五年计划，该计划将半导体和软件系统行业列为国家优先发展领域。

This effort spawned state-owned companies that are increasingly winning major contracts. Two firms awarded the Harbin tenders were subsidiaries of China Electronics Corporation and China Electronics Technology Group Corporation - both heavily targeted by U.S. sanctions.

这种努力催生了越来越多的国有企业赢得重大合同。哈尔滨招标的两家公司是中国电子信息产业集团公司和中国电子科技集团公司的子公司，这两家公司都是美国制裁的重点目标。

The state regulator's 2022 order pushed SOEs away from U.S. companies such as Microsoft (MSFT.O) and Adobe (ADBE.O), according to an employee of a Beijing-based firm that develops domestic office-processing software

北京一家开发国内办公处理软件的公司的一名员工表示，国家监管机构的 2022 年命令迫使国有企业远离微软(MSFT.O)和 Adob​​e (ADBE.O)等美国公司

China Tobacco, for example, in July began switching some subsidiaries from Microsoft Windows to Huawei's EulerOS, according to an employee of a software vendor that services the state-owned manufacturer.

例如，据为该国有制造商提供服务的软件供应商的一名员工透露，中国烟草于 7 月开始将部分子公司从微软 Windows 切换到华为的 EulerOS。

The people spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss clients and competitors.

这些人士要求匿名，因为他们无权讨论客户和竞争对手。

For years, Western tech companies have shared their source code and entered into partnerships with domestic firms to address Beijing's concerns, but prominent computer scientists such as Ni Guangnan of the Chinese Academy of Engineering have said such measures are not sufficient for China's security needs.

多年来，西方科技公司一直共享源代码并与国内公司建立合作伙伴关系，以解决北京方面的担忧，但中国工程院院士倪光南等著名计算机科学家表示，此类措施不足以满足中国的安全需求。

China Tobacco, Microsoft and Adobe did not respond to requests for comment.

中国烟草、微软和Adobe没有回应置评请求。

In September, Reuters and other outlets reported that some employees of central government agencies were banned from using iPhones at work.

9 月，路透社和其他媒体报道称，中央政府机构的一些员工被禁止在工作中使用 iPhone。

"In certain sectors, customers ... are opting for domestic suppliers, with foreign suppliers frequently facing informal barriers," the European Union Chamber of Commerce in Beijing said in response to Reuters questions.

“在某些领域，客户……正在选择国内供应商，而外国供应商经常面临非正式障碍，”北京欧盟商会在回答路透社的问题时表示。

In a 2023 American Chamber of Commerce (AmCham) in Shanghai report, 89% of the organization's tech business members named procurement practices favoring domestic competitors as a regulatory obstacle. It was the highest percentage of any sector.

在上海美国商会 (AmCham) 2023 年的一份报告中，该组织 89% 的科技企业成员将有利于国内竞争对手的采购做法视为监管障碍。这是所有行业中比例最高的。

AmCham Shanghai President Eric Zheng acknowledged China's national security concerns but said he hoped "normal procurement procedures will not be politicized so that US companies can compete fairly and pursue commercial opportunities ... to benefit both countries."

上海美国商会会长郑重承认中国的国家安全担忧，但表示希望“正常采购程序不会被政治化，以便美国公司能够公平竞争并寻求商业机会……让两国受益。”

The U.S. Department of Commerce, China Electronics Corporation and China Electronics Technology Group Corporation did not return requests for comment.

美国商务部、中国电子信息产业集团公司和中国电子科技集团公司没有回复置评请求。

HUAWEI PRIZED

Chinese tech conglomerate Huawei has emerged as the leading firm in this replacement cycle, according to three people familiar with China's enterprise tech industry, who spoke on condition of anonymity given the sensitivity of the issue.

据三位熟悉中国企业科技行业的人士透露，中国科技集团华为已成为这一更换周期中的领头羊。考虑到问题的敏感性，这些人士要求匿名。

In 2022, Huawei's enterprise business, which includes software and cloud computing operations, reported 133 billion yuan in sales, up 30% on the previous year.

2022年，包括软件和云计算业务在内的华为企业业务销售额达1330亿元人民币，较上年增长30%。

One of the people said privately-held Huawei was seen as more nimble than state-owned groups in rolling out products and executing projects.

其中一位人士表示，私营企业华为在推出产品和执行项目方面被认为比国有企业更加灵活。

The other two sources highlighted Huawei's broad product suite - spanning chips to software - as an advantage.

另外两位消息人士强调了华为广泛的产品系列（从芯片到软件）的优势。

Clients also prize Huawei for its ability to process data on internal company servers and external cloud networks, as well as its wide offering of cybersecurity products, according to the employee of a China Tobacco tech supplier.

据中烟一家技术供应商的员工称，客户还因其处理公司内部服务器和外部云网络数据的能力以及提供广泛的网络安全产品而对华为表示赞赏。

Huawei declined to comment.

华为拒绝置评。

The replacement drive has re-drawn entire sub-sectors of the software industry. The combined China market share held by five major foreign makers of database management systems – the majority of which are American - dropped from 57.3% in 2018 to 27.3% by the end of 2022, according to industry group IDC.

更换驱动器重新绘制了软件行业的整个子行业。根据行业组织 IDC 的数据，五家主要外国数据库管理系统制造商（其中大部分是美国制造商）在中国的市场份额合计从 2018 年的 57.3% 下降到 2022 年底的 27.3%。

Despite heavy spending on domestic substitution, however, foreign firms are still dominant suppliers for banking and telecoms database management. Non-Chinese companies held 90% of market share for banking database systems at the end of 2022, according to EqualOcean, a tech consultancy.

然而，尽管在国内替代方面投入了大量资金，外国公司仍然是银行和电信数据库管理的主要供应商。根据科技咨询公司 EqualOcean 的数据，截至 2022 年底，非中国公司占据了银行数据库系统 90% 的市场份额。

Financial institutions are generally reluctant to switch database systems despite government pressure, said one of the industry sources, adding that they have higher stability requirements than many other sectors and local players cannot yet match their needs.

一位业内人士表示，尽管有政府压力，金融机构普遍不愿更换数据库系统，并补充说，金融机构对稳定性的要求比许多其他行业更高，而本地企业还无法满足他们的需求。

Even for personal computers, banks that switch from an international brand to China's dominant supplier Lenovo (0992.HK) would still be reliant on critical chip components provided by Western firms, one of the industry sources said.

一位业内消息人士称，即使在个人电脑方面，从国际品牌转向中国主要供应商联想（0992.HK）的银行仍将依赖西方公司提供的关键芯片组件。

($1 = 7.3165 Chinese yuan)

（1 美元 = 7.3165 人民币）

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Editing by Brenda Goh and Katerina Ang

北京新闻编辑室报道；编辑：Brenda Goh 和 Katerina Ang

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，拜登将于周五与中国最高外交官王毅通话
item.description:
President Joe Biden is expected to speak with Wang Yi when China's top diplomat visits the White House this week, according to two U.S. officials familiar with planning for the visit.

据两名熟悉访问计划的美国官员透露，预计中国最高外交官王毅本周访问白宫时，乔·拜登总统将与王毅进行交谈。

Wang, who is set to meet Biden's national security adviser Jake Sullivan, at the White House on Friday could see Biden in person at that time, according to one of the people.

据一位知情人士透露，王定于周五在白宫会见拜登的国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文，届时可能会亲自见到拜登。

The White House declined to comment.

白宫拒绝发表评论。

It is unclear how substantial their interaction will be, but even an informal greeting would be Biden's senior-most interaction with the Chinese government since he briefly met Chinese President Xi Jinping's No. 2, Premier Li Qiang, on the sidelines of the G20 summit in New Delhi.

目前尚不清楚他们的互动会有多实质性，但即使是一次非正式的问候，也将是拜登自 2017 年 G20 峰会期间短暂会见中国国家主席习近平的第二号总理李强以来与中国政府的最高级互动。新德里。

It comes as U.S. and Chinese officials set the stage for a long-sought, one-on-one meeting between Biden and Xi at November's Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in San Francisco. Xi and Biden last met at a summit in Bali last November.

在此之际，美国和中国官员正在为拜登和习近平在 11 月于旧金山举行的亚太经合组织 (APEC) 峰会上进行期待已久的一对一会晤做准备。习近平和拜登上次会面是在去年11月巴厘岛峰会上。

Wang is also set to meet Secretary of State Antony Blinken during his trip to Washington this Thursday through Saturday. Several top U.S. officials including Blinken met their Chinese counterparts in Beijing this summer.

王毅还将于本周四至周六访问华盛顿期间会见国务卿安东尼·布林肯。今年夏天，包括布林肯在内的几位美国高级官员在北京会见了中国同行。

Wang is the top foreign affairs official in the Chinese Communist Party and also foreign minister since the dismissal of Qin Gang in July.

王毅是中共最高外交官员，也是自7月秦刚被解职以来的外交部长。

Biden said during a press conference on Wednesday he plans to "compete" with China "according to the international rules - economically, politically, and other ways - but I'm not looking for conflict." He also warned Chinese officials against aggression toward the Philippines.

拜登在周三的新闻发布会上表示，他计划“根据国际规则——经济、政治和其他方式——与中国“竞争”，但我并不寻求冲突。”他还警告中国官员不要侵略菲律宾。

For his part, Xi said on Wednesday China is willing to cooperate with the United States as both sides manage their differences and work together to respond to global challenges, according to Chinese state media.

据中国官方媒体报道，习近平周三表示，中国愿意与美国合作，管控分歧，共同应对全球挑战。

Reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt; Editing by Heather Timmons and Lincoln Feast.

item.title: 美国放弃向世贸组织提出数字贸易要求，为加强科技监管留出空间
item.description:
U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai has dropped longstanding U.S. digital trade demands in World Trade Organization talks in order to give Congress room to regulate big tech firms, her office said on Wednesday.

美国贸易代表戴凯瑟琳·戴 (Katherine Tai) 办公室周三表示，她在世界贸易组织谈判中放弃了美国长期以来的数字贸易要求，以便为国会提供监管大型科技公司的空间。

The U.S. is withdrawing proposals made in 2019 by the Trump administration insisting that WTO e-commerce rules allow free cross-border data flows and prohibit national requirements for data localization and reviews of software source code.

美国正在撤回特朗普政府2019年提出的提案，该提案坚称世贸组织电子商务规则允许跨境数据自由流动，并禁止国家对数据本地化和软件源代码审查的要求。

The decision angered some lawmakers and business groups, who said it would put U.S. firms at a disadvantage.

这一决定激怒了一些立法者和商业团体，他们表示这将使美国公司处于不利地位。

The withdrawals were made in Geneva during a meeting of the WTO's Joint Statement Initiative on E-Commerce, with a U.S. official saying that the U.S. was reviewing its approach to trade rules in sensitive areas such as data and source code.

这些撤回是在世贸组织电子商务联合声明倡议会议期间于日内瓦举行的，一位美国官员表示，美国正在审查其在数据和源代码等敏感领域的贸易规则方法。

The official said U.S. policy must take into account regulatory objectives, "balancing the right to regulate in the public interest and the need to address anticompetitive behavior in the digital economy," according to a transcript seen by Reuters.

根据路透社看到的一份文字记录，该官员表示，美国政策必须考虑监管目标，“平衡公共利益的监管权利和解决数字经济中反竞争行为的需要”。

The USTR move aligns with the Biden administration's desire to strengthen regulation of large technology firms and the direction of digital trade negotiations in the U.S.-led Indo-Pacific Economic Framework for Prosperity (IPEF) group of Asian countries.

美国贸易代表办公室的举措符合拜登政府加强对大型科技公司监管的愿望，以及美国主导的印太经济繁荣框架（IPEF）亚洲国家集团数字贸易谈判的方向。

'WIN FOR CHINA'

But Senator Ron Wyden, the Oregon Democrat who leads the Senate Finance Committee, called the move "a win for China, plain and simple," saying it would strengthen the Chinese model of internet censorship and government surveillance.

但领导参议院财政委员会的俄勒冈州民主党参议员罗恩·怀登称此举“简单明了，是中国的胜利”，并表示这将加强中国的互联网审查和政府监控模式。

"USTR’s unilateral decision to abandon any leverage against China’s digital expansionism, and to oppose policies championed by allies like Australia, Japan, the U.K. and Korea, directly contradicts its mission as delegated by Congress," said Wyden, who has long championed big U.S. tech firms, including Intel (INTC.O), the largest for-profit employer in Oregon.

长期支持美国大型科技公司的怀登表示：“美国贸易代表单方面决定放弃对中国数字扩张主义的任何影响力，并反对澳大利亚、日本、英国和韩国等盟友倡导的政策，这直接违背了国会赋予其的使命。”公司，包括俄勒冈州最大的营利性雇主英特尔（INTC.O） 。

USTR spokesman Sam Michel said many countries were examining their approaches to data and source code, and how trade rules can affect them.

美国贸易代表办公室发言人萨姆·米歇尔表示，许多国家正在研究其处理数据和源代码的方法，以及贸易规则如何影响它们。

"In order to provide enough policy space for those debates to unfold, the United States has removed its support for proposals that might prejudice or hinder those domestic policy considerations," Michel said in a statement to Reuters, adding that the U.S. would remain "an active participant" in the WTO e-commerce talks.

米歇尔在给路透社的一份声明中表示：“为了给这些辩论的展开提供足够的政策空间，美国已经取消了对可能损害或阻碍这些国内政策考虑的提案的支持。”他补充说，美国将继续“积极参与世贸组织电子商务谈判。

The move was applauded by some lawmakers who want to rein in large tech firms, including Democratic Senator Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts, who said Tai was rejecting efforts by Big Tech lobbyists to use trade deals to thwart regulation.

此举受到了一些想要控制大型科技公司的立法者的欢迎，其中包括马萨诸塞州民主党参议员伊丽莎白·沃伦(Elizabeth Warren)，她表示戴泰拒绝了大型科技游说者利用贸易协议来阻挠监管的努力。

"We need to make clear that digital rules favoring Big Tech monopolies are a non-starter for the U.S. in any trade agreement, including IPEF,” she said.

她表示：“我们需要明确表示，在包括 IPEF 在内的任何贸易协议中，有利于大型科技垄断企业的数字规则对于美国来说都是不可能的。”

U.S. Chamber of Commerce said the digital trade principles being dropped by USTR won overwhelming congressional support as part of the 2020 U.S.-Mexico-Canada Agreement on trade and have helped to make U.S. tech firms "the envy of the world." The top business lobby group urged a reversal by USTR.

美国商会表示，作为 2020 年美国-墨西哥-加拿大贸易协议的一部分，美国贸易代表办公室放弃的数字贸易原则赢得了国会压倒性的支持，并帮助美国科技公司“令全世界羡慕”。顶级商业游说团体敦促美国贸易代表办公室撤销这一决定。

"These digital trade rules prevent countries around the world from using regulation to lock out American companies and their workers from their markets," said John Murphy, the Chamber's senior vice president for international policy.

美国商会负责国际政策的高级副会长约翰·墨菲表示：“这些数字贸易规则阻止世界各国利用监管将美国公司及其工人排除在市场之外。”

Reporting by David Lawder; editing by Diane Craft

item.title: 亚洲 熟悉的模式——股市暴跌，收益率飙升
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets from Jamie McGeever, financial markets columnist.

金融市场专栏作家杰米·麦克吉弗 (Jamie McGeever) 对亚洲市场未来一天的展望。

Asian markets on Thursday are set to open on the defensive, with sentiment battered by one of the biggest selloffs of the year in U.S. tech stocks and a renewed spike in longer-dated U.S. Treasury bond yields the day before.

周四亚洲市场将以守势开盘，美国科技股遭遇今年最大的抛售之一，加上前一天美国长期国债收益率再次飙升，市场情绪受到打击。

The regional focus turns to advance third quarter South Korean GDP figures, unemployment and industrial production data from Singapore, and Reserve Bank of Australia governor Michele Bullock's Senate testimony.

区域焦点转向韩国第三季度 GDP数据、新加坡失业率和工业生产数据，以及澳大利亚储备银行行长米歇尔·布洛克在参议院的证词。

The fog of uncertainty descended further over China's embattled property sector after it was reported on Wednesday that China's largest private lender Country Garden has defaulted on a U.S. dollar bond for the first time.

周三有报道称，中国最大的私人银行碧桂园首次出现美元债券违约，中国陷入困境的房地产行业的不确定性迷雾进一步笼罩。

There's little sign of the pressure on Japan's bonds and currency easing either, after the yen briefly slipped below 150.00 per dollar again on Wednesday and the 10-year Japanese bond yield hit a fresh decade-high above 0.87%.

在周三日元兑美元汇率再次短暂跌破150.00且日本10年期债券收益率触及0.87%以上的十年新高后，日本债券和货币宽松的压力也几乎没有迹象。

But the broader tone in Asia on Thursday will be set by another decline in U.S. stocks and bonds.

但周四亚洲市场的整体基调将由美国股市和债券的再次下跌决定。

The Nasdaq's 2.4% slide on Wednesday was driven by a 9.5% plunge in Google-parent Alphabet's shares after its cloud division missed revenue estimates, raising doubts over the artificial intelligence boom that is supposed to drive the global economy forward in the coming years and decades.

周三，纳斯达克指数下跌 2.4%，原因是谷歌母公司 Alphabet 的云部门营收未达预期，股价暴跌9.5%，这引发了人们对人工智能热潮的怀疑，而人工智能热潮本应在未来几年和几十年内推动全球经济向前发展。 。

The benchmark 10-year Treasury yield, meanwhile, appears poised to make another attempt on 5.0% after leaping 10 basis points.

与此同时，基准 10 年期国债收益率在跃升 10 个基点后似乎准备再次尝试 5.0%。

Financial conditions tightened quite sharply on Wednesday.

周三金融状况急剧收紧。

The global market moves represented a familiar pattern since the flare-up in Middle East violence nearly three weeks ago - higher bond yields, a 'bear steepening' of the U.S. yield curve, a stronger dollar, and higher oil and gold prices.

自近三周前中东暴力事件爆发以来，全球市场走势呈现出一种熟悉的模式——债券收益率上升、美国收益率曲线“熊市陡峭化”、美元走强以及石油和黄金价格上涨。

Gold has risen almost 10% since Oct. 7 and has $2,000/oz in its sights. Bitcoin, meanwhile, rose for a seventh consecutive session on Wednesday, during which time it has appreciated almost 25%.

自 10 月 7 日以来，黄金已上涨近 10%，目标价为 2,000 美元/盎司。与此同时，比特币在周三连续第七个交易日上涨，在此期间上涨了近 25%。

The main Asian data point on Thursday will be South Korean GDP. Growth is expected to have slowed to 0.5% quarter-on-quarter on a seasonally adjusted basis from 0.6% in the April-June period, as high borrowing costs weighed on consumer spending and exports recovered at a slow pace.

周四的主要亚洲数据将是韩国 GDP。由于高借贷成本打压消费者支出且出口复苏缓慢，预计经季节调整后环比增速将从 4 月至 6 月的 0.6% 放缓至 0.5%。

Year-on-year growth is expected to have picked up to 1.1% from 0.9%.

预计同比增长率将从 0.9% 升至 1.1%。

Australia's central bank chief Bullock's testimony to parliament will be closely watched too, after surprisingly strong inflation figures on Wednesday appeared to increase the likelihood that interest rates could be raised again, as early as next month.

澳大利亚央行行长布洛克在议会的证词也将受到密切关注，周三出人意料的强劲通胀数据似乎增加了最早在下个月再次加息的可能性。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Thursday:

以下是周四可能为市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- South Korea GDP (Q3)

- 韩国 GDP（第三季度）

- RBA governor Bullock speaks

- 澳洲联储行长布洛克讲话

item.title: 白宫寻求资金用于互联网补贴和拆除中国设备
item.description:
The White House is asking Congress for $6 billion for a government broadband internet subsidy program used by 21 million American households that is set to run out of money next year.

白宫正在要求国会拨款 60 亿美元用于政府宽带互联网补贴计划，该计划供 2100 万美国家庭使用，该计划将于明年耗尽资金。

The Biden administration also wants $3.1 billion to further fund removal of equipment made by Chinese telecoms giants Huawei and ZTE (000063.SZ) from U.S. telecom networks.

拜登政府还希望提供31亿美元，进一步资助将中国电信巨头华为和中兴通讯（000063.SZ）制造的设备从美国电信网络中移除。

The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) previously said removing the equipment, which it says poses national security risks, would cost $4.98 billion. Congress has only approved $1.9 billion. In 2019, Congress told the FCC to require U.S. telecoms carriers that receive federal subsidies to purge their networks of Chinese telecoms equipment.

美国联邦通信委员会 (FCC) 此前表示，移除这些设备将花费 49.8 亿美元，并称这些设备构成国家安全风险。国会仅批准了 19 亿美元。 2019年，国会要求联邦通信委员会要求接受联邦补贴的美国电信运营商清除其网络中的中国电信设备。

Congress previously allocated $17 billion to help lower-income families and people impacted by COVID-19 to gain internet access through a $30 per month voucher to use toward paying for internet service.

国会此前拨款 170 亿美元，帮助低收入家庭和受 COVID-19 影响的人们通过每月 30 美元的代金券获得互联网接入，用于支付互联网服务费用。

The White House says the program known as the Affordable Connectivity Program, helps current users save over $500 million per month on their internet bills. The $6 billion in additional government funding would extend the program through December 2024.

白宫表示，该计划被称为“平价连接计划”，可帮助当前用户每月节省超过 5 亿美元的互联网费用。 60 亿美元的额外政府资金将使该计划延长至 2024 年 12 月。

"Congress should act swiftly to fund the Affordable Connectivity Program and prevent more than 21 million households from losing access to affordable, high-speed internet," said White House National Economic Council director Lael Brainard.

白宫国家经济委员会主任莱尔·布雷纳德 (Lael Brainard) 表示：“国会应迅速采取行动，为平价互联计划提供资金，并防止超过 2100 万家庭失去负担得起的高速互联网。”

Internet service providers say there are about 27 million additional U.S. households that are eligible but are not yet enrolled.

互联网服务提供商表示，还有约 2700 万美国家庭符合资格但尚未注册。

Verizon (VZ.N), Comcast (CMCSA.O) and AT&T (T.N) have all called for Congress to extend the program that could run out of money by March.

Verizon (VZ.N) 、康卡斯特(CMCSA.O)和 AT&T (TN)均呼吁国会延长该计划，该计划可能会在 3 月份耗尽资金。

Reporting by David Shepardson; Editing by Cynthia Osterman

item.title: 俄罗斯和中国否决美国推动联合国对以色列和加沙采取行动
item.description:
Russia and China vetoed on Wednesday a U.S.-drafted U.N. Security Council resolution on the war between Israel and Palestinian militants Hamas in the Gaza Strip.

周三，俄罗斯和中国否决了美国起草的联合国安理会关于以色列和巴勒斯坦武装分子哈马斯在加沙地带战争的决议。

The draft aimed to address a worsening humanitarian crisis in Gaza, calling for pauses the violence to allow aid access. The United Arab Emirates also voted no, while 10 members voted in favor and two abstained.

该草案旨在解决加沙日益恶化的人道主义危机，呼吁暂停暴力以允许援助进入。阿拉伯联合酋长国也投了反对票，10 名成员投了赞成票，2 名弃权。

item.title: 美国在首次金融工作组会议上“坦诚提出”与中国的分歧
item.description:
U.S. officials "frankly raised areas of disagreement" with China at the first meeting of a new financial working group, where financial stability, supervision and regulation were discussed, the U.S. Treasury said on Wednesday.

美国财政部周三表示，美国官员在新金融工作组的第一次会议上“坦率地提出了与中国的分歧领域”，会议讨论了金融稳定、监督和监管问题。

Attendees included senior officials from China's central bank and the U.S. Treasury Department, according to a Treasury statement.

根据美国财政部的一份声明，与会者包括中国央行和美国财政部的高级官员。

"The two-hour virtual meeting included a substantive and wide-ranging discussion on domestic and global financial stability, financial supervision and regulation, sustainable finance, and anti-money laundering and countering the financing of terrorism," the Treasury said.

美国财政部表示：“两个小时的虚拟会议就国内和全球金融稳定、金融监督和监管、可持续金融、反洗钱和打击资助恐怖主义等问题进行了实质性和广泛的讨论。”

The financial working group and a parallel economic working group were launched last month after U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen's visit to Beijing in July aimed at fostering regular communications between the world's two largest economies.

美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦 (Janet Yellen) 7 月访问北京后， 上个月成立了金融工作组和平行经济工作组，旨在促进世界最大两个经济体之间的定期沟通。

The economic working group, led by senior officials from the Treasury and China's Finance Ministry held its first meeting on Monday.

由财政部和中国财政部高级官员领导的经济工作组周一举行了第一次会议。

Yellen met with People's Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng on Oct. 13 on the sidelines of International Monetary Fund and World Bank annual meetings in Marrakech, Morocco, and discussed debt issues plaguing developing economies and the global financial architecture.

10月13日，耶伦在摩洛哥马拉喀什出席国际货币基金组织和世界银行年会期间会见中国人民银行行长潘功胜，双方讨论了困扰发展中经济体的债务问题和全球金融架构。

Yellen told Reuters in an interview that the discussion included a U.S.-backed plan to increase IMF quota-based lending resources without changes to its shareholding structure. China has been reluctant to support the funding increase without an increase in its IMF shares, but Yellen said the "equi-proportional" quota increase is "pretty likely" to succeed.

耶伦在接受路透社采访时表示，讨论内容包括一项美国支持的计划，即在不改变其股权结构的情况下增加国际货币基金组织基于配额的贷款资源。中国一直不愿在不增加其国际货币基金组织份额的情况下支持增加资金，但耶伦表示，“等比例”配额增加“很有可能”成功。

Reporting by Ismail Shakil, Costas Pitas and David Lawder; editing by Paul Grant and Diane Craft

伊斯梅尔·沙基尔 (Ismail Shakil)、科斯塔斯·皮塔斯 (Costas Pitas) 和大卫·劳德 (David Lawder) 报道；保罗·格兰特和黛安·克拉夫特编辑

item.title: 中国国防部批评五角大楼年度报告
item.description:
China's defence ministry on Wednesday denounced the U.S. Defense Department's annual report on China, saying it distorts the country's security policy and military strategy.

中国国防部周三谴责美国国防部年度对华报告，称其歪曲中国安全政策和军事战略。

Over the next decade, the People's Republic of China will rapidly modernise, diversify, and expand its nuclear forces, the Pentagon said in its report to U.S. Congress, laying out China's national ambitions, including its defence policy and military strategies.

五角大楼在向美国国会提交的报告中表示，未来十年，中华人民共和国将迅速实现核力量现代化、多样化和扩张，阐述了中国的国家雄心，包括国防政策和军事战略。

The Pentagon said China has more than 500 nuclear warheads and will probably have more than 1,000 warheads by 2030. The report said China would use new fast-breeder reactors and reprocessing facilities to produce plutonium for its nuclear weapons, despite publicly saying the technologies are intended for peaceful purposes.

五角大楼表示，中国拥有超过 500 枚核弹头，到 2030 年可能会拥有超过 1,000 枚核弹头。该报告称，中国将使用新的快中子增殖反应堆和后处理设施来生产核武器所需的钚，尽管公开表示这些技术的目的是出于和平目的。

"We express our strong dissatisfaction and resolute opposition to this report," Chinese Defence Ministry spokesperson Wu Qian said in a statement, adding that it "exaggerates and hypes the non-existent 'Chinese military threat'".

中国国防部发言人吴谦在一份声明中表示，“我们对这份报告表示强烈不满和坚决反对”，并补充说，该报告“夸大和炒作了不存在的‘中国军事威胁’”。

Wu said the development of China's armed forces is aimed at containing the threat of war, safeguarding its own security and safeguarding world peace, and is not aimed at any specific country or target.

吴邦国表示，中国军队的发展是为了遏制战争威胁、维护自身安全、维护世界和平，不针对任何特定国家和目标。

China and the United States have recently traded barbs over global and national security concerns, military interactions in the South China Sea and over Taiwan, which China claims as its own territory.

中国和美国最近就全球和国家安全问题、南海军事互动以及中国声称拥有主权的台湾问题互相指责。

The Pentagon said in 2022 that China "amplified diplomatic, political, and military pressure against Taiwan".

五角大楼在2022年表示，中国“加大了对台湾的外交、政治和军事压力”。

"The so-called report on China's military power released by the United States is full of all kinds of wrong content, including the statement on the Taiwan issue," a spokesperson for China's Taiwan Affairs Office said at a media briefing on Wednesday.

中国国台办发言人周三在例行记者会上表示，美国发布的所谓中国军力报告充满了各种错误内容，包括有关台湾问题的表述。

Calling the military-to-military relationship an important part of Sino-U.S. relations, the Defence Ministry's Wu said, "we maintain frank and effective communication with the United States through military diplomacy".

吴仪表示，两军关系是中美关系的重要组成部分，“我们通过军事外交同美国保持着坦诚有效的沟通”。

But he added the difficulties and obstacles facing relations between the two militaries are created by the United States.

但他补充说，两军关系面临的困难和障碍是美国制造的。

"The United States pretends to be confused, while doing things that harm China's security interests, but at the same time shouting that it wants to manage the crisis and strengthen communication," Wu said.

“美国装糊涂，一边做损害中国安全利益的事情，一边喊着要管控危机、加强沟通，”吴说。

The latest exchange between the two countries comes days before China hosts foreign defence officials at the 10th Xiangshan Forum in Beijing from Oct. 29 to 31.

两国之间的最新交流是在中国于 10 月 29 日至 31 日在北京接待外国国防官员出席第十届香山论坛之前几天进行的。

The United States accepted China's invitation after China turned down a meeting a few months ago between the two countries' defence chiefs.

在中国几个月前拒绝两国国防部长会晤后，美国接受了中国的邀请。

Reporting by Bernard Orr; Editing by Gerry Doyle

item.title: 中国用新舰艇追赶美国和俄罗斯的导弹潜艇能力
item.description:
China has launched its first nuclear-powered guided missile submarines, according to the Pentagon's latest report on China's military - giving it land and sea attack options once the sole province of U.S. and Russian vessels.

根据五角大楼关于中国军事的最新报告，中国已经下水了第一艘核动力导弹潜艇，这让中国拥有了曾经是美国和俄罗斯船只的唯一管辖范围的陆地和海上攻击选择。

The Pentagon report, published Oct. 20, marks the first apparent confirmation that modified submarines seen in Chinese shipyards over the last 18 months are Type 093B guided missile submarines.

五角大楼10月20日发布的报告首次明显证实过去18个月在中国造船厂看到的改装潜艇是093B型导弹潜艇。

Reuters revealed in May 2022 that satellite images from Huludao shipyard in northeast China showed a new or upgraded class of submarine, possibly with vertical tubes for launching cruise missiles.

路透社于 2022 年 5 月透露，中国东北葫芦岛造船厂的卫星图像显示了一种新型或升级型潜艇，可能配有用于发射巡航导弹的垂直管。

The Pentagon report says that in the short term, the Chinese navy "will have the ability to conduct long-range precision strikes against land targets from its submarine and surface combatants using land-attack cruise missiles, notably enhancing (China's) power projection capability".

五角大楼的报告称，短期内，中国海军“将有能力使用对地攻击巡航导弹从潜艇和水面战舰上对陆地目标进行远程精确打击，特别是增强（中国的）力量投送能力” 。

Known as SSGNs, conventionally armed missile submarines were developed by the Soviet Union during the Cold War in part to target U.S. aircraft carriers, while the U.S. Navy developed its own version by converting ballistic missile boats to carry large numbers of land-attack Tomahawk cruise missiles.

常规武装导弹潜艇被称为SSGN，是苏联在冷战期间开发的，部分目的是针对美国航空母舰，而美国海军则通过将弹道导弹艇改装为携带大量对地攻击战斧巡航导弹来开发自己的版本。

Cruise missiles are typically long-range, precision weapons that, unlike ballistic weapons, fly at low altitudes or skim the surface of the sea.

巡航导弹通常是远程精确武器，与弹道武器不同，巡航导弹可以低空飞行或掠过海面。

The submarine USS Florida fired 93 Tomahawks against Libyan air defences in 2011 - the first combat strikes from a U.S. SSGN and an event that regional military attaches say was closely studied by Chinese strategists.

2011年，佛罗里达号潜艇向利比亚防空系统发射了93枚“战斧”导弹——这是美国战略核潜艇的首次战斗打击，地区武官称中国战略家对这一事件进行了密切研究。

Some analysts say the PLA navy will be eager to deploy the vessels as an extra weapon against aircraft carriers as well as a land-attack platform, allowing strikes from a far greater range than its fleets of smaller attack submarines.

一些分析人士表示，解放军海军将渴望部署这些舰艇，作为对抗航空母舰的额外武器以及对地攻击平台，与小型攻击潜艇舰队相比，可以从更远的范围进行攻击。

The report notes that three of the new SSGNs could be operational by next year, as part of a wider expansion of its submarine fleet - both nuclear and diesel powered - which could number 65 vessels in 2025.

报告指出，三艘新的弹道导弹核潜艇可能会在明年投入使用，作为其潜艇舰队（核动力和柴油动力）更广泛扩张的一部分，到 2025 年，潜艇舰队的数量可能达到 65 艘。

The Chinese defence ministry did not respond to questions from Reuters.

中国国防部没有回应路透社的提问。

The confirmation comes amid an intensifying submarine arms race as China constructs a new generation of nuclear-armed boats as part of its evolving deterrent force.

这一确认是在潜艇军备竞赛加剧之际做出的，中国正在建造新一代核潜艇，作为其不断发展的威慑力量的一部分。

The effort to track China's submarines at sea is one of the core drivers of increased deployments and contingency planning by the U.S. Navy and other militaries across the Indo-Pacific region.

在海上追踪中国潜艇的努力是美国海军和印太地区其他军队增加部署和应急计划的核心驱动力之一。

Singapore-based security scholar Collin Koh said the SSGNs were an important new capability for the Chinese navy.

新加坡安全学者科林·科(Collin Koh)表示，弹道导弹核潜艇是中国海军的一项重要新能力。

With an expected core armament of cruise missiles, "this potentially allows them to carry out saturated land and anti-ship attacks at standoff range”, he said, which would complicate strategic calculations by China's rivals.

他表示，凭借预期的巡航导弹核心武器，“这可能使他们能够在防区外范围内进行饱和陆地和反舰攻击”，这将使中国竞争对手的战略计算变得复杂。

"I would also expect the Chinese have learned from the Russian experience in using them to threaten U.S. aircraft carriers – with an SSGN, you can launch strikes at standoff range, unlike a typical attack submarine that could have more limited weapon options, and that is a real advantage," said Koh, of the S. Rajaratnam School of International Studies.

“我还希望中国人从俄罗斯使用它们威胁美国航空母舰的经验中吸取教训——使用弹道导弹核潜艇，你可以在防区外范围内发动攻击，这与典型的攻击潜艇不同，后者的武器选择可能更加有限，而且这是一个真正的优势，”拉惹勒南国际研究学院的 Koh 说。

Research discussed at the U.S. Naval War College in May noted that the PLA was close to breakthroughs in making its nuclear-powered submarines far quieter and more difficult for the U.S. and its allies to track.

美国海军战争学院五月份讨论的研究表明，解放军在使其核动力潜艇变得更安静、更难以被美国及其盟国追踪方面即将取得突破。

Some diplomats and analysts said, however, that it was unclear whether those breakthroughs had been incorporated into the recently launched SSGNs. The upgrades are expected in nuclear-powered boats launched before the end of the decade.

然而，一些外交官和分析人士表示，目前尚不清楚这些突破是否已被纳入最近发射的弹道导弹核潜艇中。预计本世纪末之前推出的核动力船将进行升级。

"Unless they are certain of improvements, we can expect the PLA navy to be cautious in how they initially deploy them," said an Asian military attache who is tracking China's submarine force. The attache declined to be named because of the sensitivity of the matter. "But we know the submarine force is a priority for Xi Jinping, and this is one more sign they are getting there."

一位正在跟踪中国潜艇部队的亚洲武官表示：“除非他们确定能取得改进，否则我们可以预期解放军海军在最初部署这些潜艇的方式上会持谨慎态度。”由于此事敏感，该专员拒绝透露姓名。 “但我们知道潜艇部队是习近平的首要任务，这是他们正在实现这一目标的又一个迹象。”

Reporting By Greg Torode. Editing by Gerry Doyle

格雷格·托罗德报道。格里·多伊尔编辑
